title: REAP Vekta aero road bike debuts with UK-made, ultra-stiff monocoque frame
content:
REAP Bikes has unveiled their new Vekta aero road bike, and it’s a full one-piece monocoque design that’s made as a single piece in the UK. That construction method and origin story aren’t the best part of the story, though…it’s the layup and design that they say sets this bike apart from other fast road […]
